title: Colorado Lace
description: What will it take for three strong and determined women to see that love is close to home? Will the female medical student be dazzled by new city friends or find true love back home? Will the abused wife and mother be forced to return to her opulent prison, or will she discover true love within her new hometown? Will the female sheriffâ€™s third attempt at romance be the winner, or has her true love been hidden under the veil of a comfortable friendship? Enjoy three romances from historic Colorado by author Rachel Druten.
author: Rachel Druten
